resources.string:
Historya is a 2D Educational 
Game with the aim to 
provide questions related 
to history to test the 
player's knowledge on 
the said matter.

Use the digital screen 
control to navigate around 
the area. Use the sword to 
slash through your enemies.
What is the secret code used for this ceremonial gathering?

One day while strolling on an 
enchanted forest, Alzack saw 
a portal. Curious he went near 
it and was immediately pulled 
in. Upon waking up he found 
himself in an old uncivilized 
place. Upon asking a local, he 
found out he's now in 1850s 
Philippine era. He must find 
the mage who opened the 
portal so he could go back to 
his present timeline...
Alzack got killed. \nSorry, you lost. Thank \nyou for playing...
